name: OpenCart Extensions
body:
### Welcome to OpenCart Extensions.
This page is maintained by [CGSmith.net](http://www.cgsmith.net) and is a place where we store all of our open source extensions! We create extensions that we find useful to the OpenCart community (without the cost).

### Requirements.
We've crafted some handsome extensions for you to use and require one thing, [vQmod](http://code.google.com/p/vqmod/).  This handy creation by @qphoria allows code modification without manual file changes.

### Authors and Contributors
@cgsmith is the current author and maintainer.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Contact us on the [OpenCart Forums](http://forum.opencart.com/) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
